metadata.title: CVE-2016-9848 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin. phpinfo (phpinfo.php) shows PHPinformation including values of HttpOnly cookies. All 4.6.x versions (priorto 4.6.5), 4.4.x versions (prior to 4.4.15.9), and 4.0.x versions (prior to4.0.10.18) are affected.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
